data: DERM AMB UVA 1 qdaily for 4 week (Day of Treatment)
Patient Care
Provider to enter specific UVA-1 dosage
Phototherapy UVA-1 Treatment
Whole Body, J/cm2, Minimum amount of time between exposures is 24 hours
Follow Up - Clinic - VGH Psoriasis/Phototherapy Clinic
Within 3 Months, In Person/Clinic, Phototherapy F/Up, UVA-1
Within 4 Months, In Person/Clinic, Phototherapy F/Up, UVA-1
Within 6 Months, In Person/Clinic, Phototherapy F/Up, UVA-1
